channel.title: [PI] Changeing the death location doesnt work

item.title: [PI] Changeing the death location doesnt work
item.dc:creator: @Danielson183 Danielson183
item.description:
@Danielson183 wrote:

[quote=“The7thSanctum, post:5, topic:535097”][quote author=Kozs link=topic=653901.msg4380550#msg4380550 date=1383374687]

So, i tryed to find the exact coordinated where i die, and i recorded them, i ended up with x=2408, y=5087.
I try and locate that positing in the files, and i find teles to jad, since that location is the jad cave…
I found like, 3 segments of code that use this coordinate, i wanna know which one is the death coordinate so i can change it, heres the code

public void resetTzhaar() { //c.jadCave = false; c.waveId = -1; c.tzhaarToKill = 1; c.tzhaarKilled = -1; c.getPA().movePlayer(2408,5087,0); }

public void enterCaves() { //c.getPA().movePlayer(2413,5117, c.playerId * 4); c.getPA().movePlayer(2408,5087, c.playerId * 4); //c.jadEvent(); c.sendMessage("He will spawn in few seconds, pot up / pray!"); c.sendMessage("To exit, run north and enter the cave!"); c.waveId = 0; c.tzhaarToKill = -1; c.tzhaarKilled = -1; //Server.fightCaves.spawnNextWave(c); c.jadSpawn(); }

public void enterNewCaves() { if(!c.getItems().playerHasItem(6570, 1)) { c.sendMessage("You don't have a FireCape in you're inventory to sacrifice!"); c.getPA().closeAllWindows(); return; } else { //c.getPA().movePlayer(2413,5117, c.playerId * 4); c.getPA().movePlayer(2408,5087, c.playerId * 4); //c.jadEvent(); c.sendMessage("Waves will spawn in few seconds, pot up / pray!"); c.sendMessage("To exit, run north and enter the cave!"); c.sendMessage("IF YOU RELOG YOU WILL HAVE TO RE-DO EVERY WAVE!"); c.getItems().deleteItem(6570, 1); c.hasFollower = -1; c.waveId = 0; c.sendMessage("NOTE: You CAN loose you're items sometimes!"); //Server.fightCaves.spawnNextWave(c); c.HardWaveSpawn(); }
Maybe there is something else that needs fixing to change the death location? Please help! And thanks for reading this!

Die type ::mypos and search the coords in your server files.

If you read what he typed, he’s already done that.

Could you post your applyDead() method please?

IF YOU actually read it, he never said that he did that. Dipshit, if he did then it would work. K?
[/quote]

and i recorded them, i ended up with x=2408, y=5087.

He has done most of what you’ve said (meaning I was right on the first part), apart from searching them in his files, so I will apologize for that side of it.

And there’s honestly no need to take offence to such a simple notation.[/quote]
I still cant get it to make you die and not mess up the jad game…

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Changeing the death location doesnt work

item.title: [PI] Changeing the death location doesnt work
item.dc:creator: @The7thSanctum The7thSanctum
item.description:
@The7thSanctum wrote:

[quote=“Kozs, post:4, topic:535097”][quote author=The7thSanctum link=topic=653901.msg4380523#msg4380523 date=1383362178]

So, i tryed to find the exact coordinated where i die, and i recorded them, i ended up with x=2408, y=5087.
I try and locate that positing in the files, and i find teles to jad, since that location is the jad cave…
I found like, 3 segments of code that use this coordinate, i wanna know which one is the death coordinate so i can change it, heres the code

public void resetTzhaar() { //c.jadCave = false; c.waveId = -1; c.tzhaarToKill = 1; c.tzhaarKilled = -1; c.getPA().movePlayer(2408,5087,0); }

public void enterCaves() { //c.getPA().movePlayer(2413,5117, c.playerId * 4); c.getPA().movePlayer(2408,5087, c.playerId * 4); //c.jadEvent(); c.sendMessage("He will spawn in few seconds, pot up / pray!"); c.sendMessage("To exit, run north and enter the cave!"); c.waveId = 0; c.tzhaarToKill = -1; c.tzhaarKilled = -1; //Server.fightCaves.spawnNextWave(c); c.jadSpawn(); }

public void enterNewCaves() { if(!c.getItems().playerHasItem(6570, 1)) { c.sendMessage("You don't have a FireCape in you're inventory to sacrifice!"); c.getPA().closeAllWindows(); return; } else { //c.getPA().movePlayer(2413,5117, c.playerId * 4); c.getPA().movePlayer(2408,5087, c.playerId * 4); //c.jadEvent(); c.sendMessage("Waves will spawn in few seconds, pot up / pray!"); c.sendMessage("To exit, run north and enter the cave!"); c.sendMessage("IF YOU RELOG YOU WILL HAVE TO RE-DO EVERY WAVE!"); c.getItems().deleteItem(6570, 1); c.hasFollower = -1; c.waveId = 0; c.sendMessage("NOTE: You CAN loose you're items sometimes!"); //Server.fightCaves.spawnNextWave(c); c.HardWaveSpawn(); }
Maybe there is something else that needs fixing to change the death location? Please help! And thanks for reading this!

Die type ::mypos and search the coords in your server files.

If you read what he typed, he’s already done that.

Could you post your applyDead() method please?
[/quote]

IF YOU actually read it, he never said that he did that. Dipshit, if he did then it would work. K?[/quote]

and i recorded them, i ended up with x=2408, y=5087.

He has done most of what you’ve said (meaning I was right on the first part), apart from searching them in his files, so I will apologize for that side of it.

And there’s honestly no need to take offence to such a simple notation.

item.title: [PI] Changeing the death location doesnt work
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

[quote=“The7thSanctum, post:3, topic:535097”][quote author=Kozs link=topic=653901.msg4380484#msg4380484 date=1383348319]

So, i tryed to find the exact coordinated where i die, and i recorded them, i ended up with x=2408, y=5087.
I try and locate that positing in the files, and i find teles to jad, since that location is the jad cave…
I found like, 3 segments of code that use this coordinate, i wanna know which one is the death coordinate so i can change it, heres the code

public void resetTzhaar() { //c.jadCave = false; c.waveId = -1; c.tzhaarToKill = 1; c.tzhaarKilled = -1; c.getPA().movePlayer(2408,5087,0); }

public void enterCaves() { //c.getPA().movePlayer(2413,5117, c.playerId * 4); c.getPA().movePlayer(2408,5087, c.playerId * 4); //c.jadEvent(); c.sendMessage("He will spawn in few seconds, pot up / pray!"); c.sendMessage("To exit, run north and enter the cave!"); c.waveId = 0; c.tzhaarToKill = -1; c.tzhaarKilled = -1; //Server.fightCaves.spawnNextWave(c); c.jadSpawn(); }

public void enterNewCaves() { if(!c.getItems().playerHasItem(6570, 1)) { c.sendMessage("You don't have a FireCape in you're inventory to sacrifice!"); c.getPA().closeAllWindows(); return; } else { //c.getPA().movePlayer(2413,5117, c.playerId * 4); c.getPA().movePlayer(2408,5087, c.playerId * 4); //c.jadEvent(); c.sendMessage("Waves will spawn in few seconds, pot up / pray!"); c.sendMessage("To exit, run north and enter the cave!"); c.sendMessage("IF YOU RELOG YOU WILL HAVE TO RE-DO EVERY WAVE!"); c.getItems().deleteItem(6570, 1); c.hasFollower = -1; c.waveId = 0; c.sendMessage("NOTE: You CAN loose you're items sometimes!"); //Server.fightCaves.spawnNextWave(c); c.HardWaveSpawn(); }
Maybe there is something else that needs fixing to change the death location? Please help! And thanks for reading this!

Die type ::mypos and search the coords in your server files.
[/quote]

If you read what he typed, he’s already done that.

Could you post your applyDead() method please?[/quote]

IF YOU actually read it, he never said that he did that. Dipshit, if he did then it would work. K?

item.description:
@The7thSanctum wrote:

[quote=“Kozs, post:2, topic:535097”][quote author=Danielson183 link=topic=653901.msg4380420#msg4380420 date=1383337248]
So, i tryed to find the exact coordinated where i die, and i recorded them, i ended up with x=2408, y=5087.
I try and locate that positing in the files, and i find teles to jad, since that location is the jad cave…
I found like, 3 segments of code that use this coordinate, i wanna know which one is the death coordinate so i can change it, heres the code

public void resetTzhaar() { //c.jadCave = false; c.waveId = -1; c.tzhaarToKill = 1; c.tzhaarKilled = -1; c.getPA().movePlayer(2408,5087,0); }

public void enterCaves() { //c.getPA().movePlayer(2413,5117, c.playerId * 4); c.getPA().movePlayer(2408,5087, c.playerId * 4); //c.jadEvent(); c.sendMessage("He will spawn in few seconds, pot up / pray!"); c.sendMessage("To exit, run north and enter the cave!"); c.waveId = 0; c.tzhaarToKill = -1; c.tzhaarKilled = -1; //Server.fightCaves.spawnNextWave(c); c.jadSpawn(); }

public void enterNewCaves() { if(!c.getItems().playerHasItem(6570, 1)) { c.sendMessage("You don't have a FireCape in you're inventory to sacrifice!"); c.getPA().closeAllWindows(); return; } else { //c.getPA().movePlayer(2413,5117, c.playerId * 4); c.getPA().movePlayer(2408,5087, c.playerId * 4); //c.jadEvent(); c.sendMessage("Waves will spawn in few seconds, pot up / pray!"); c.sendMessage("To exit, run north and enter the cave!"); c.sendMessage("IF YOU RELOG YOU WILL HAVE TO RE-DO EVERY WAVE!"); c.getItems().deleteItem(6570, 1); c.hasFollower = -1; c.waveId = 0; c.sendMessage("NOTE: You CAN loose you're items sometimes!"); //Server.fightCaves.spawnNextWave(c); c.HardWaveSpawn(); }
Maybe there is something else that needs fixing to change the death location? Please help! And thanks for reading this!
[/quote]

Die type ::mypos and search the coords in your server files.[/quote]

If you read what he typed, he’s already done that.

Could you post your applyDead() method please?

@Kozs wrote:

[quote=“Danielson183, post:1, topic:535097”]So, i tryed to find the exact coordinated where i die, and i recorded them, i ended up with x=2408, y=5087.
I try and locate that positing in the files, and i find teles to jad, since that location is the jad cave…
I found like, 3 segments of code that use this coordinate, i wanna know which one is the death coordinate so i can change it, heres the code

public void resetTzhaar() { //c.jadCave = false; c.waveId = -1; c.tzhaarToKill = 1; c.tzhaarKilled = -1; c.getPA().movePlayer(2408,5087,0); }

public void enterCaves() { //c.getPA().movePlayer(2413,5117, c.playerId * 4); c.getPA().movePlayer(2408,5087, c.playerId * 4); //c.jadEvent(); c.sendMessage("He will spawn in few seconds, pot up / pray!"); c.sendMessage("To exit, run north and enter the cave!"); c.waveId = 0; c.tzhaarToKill = -1; c.tzhaarKilled = -1; //Server.fightCaves.spawnNextWave(c); c.jadSpawn(); }

public void enterNewCaves() { if(!c.getItems().playerHasItem(6570, 1)) { c.sendMessage("You don't have a FireCape in you're inventory to sacrifice!"); c.getPA().closeAllWindows(); return; } else { //c.getPA().movePlayer(2413,5117, c.playerId * 4); c.getPA().movePlayer(2408,5087, c.playerId * 4); //c.jadEvent(); c.sendMessage("Waves will spawn in few seconds, pot up / pray!"); c.sendMessage("To exit, run north and enter the cave!"); c.sendMessage("IF YOU RELOG YOU WILL HAVE TO RE-DO EVERY WAVE!"); c.getItems().deleteItem(6570, 1); c.hasFollower = -1; c.waveId = 0; c.sendMessage("NOTE: You CAN loose you're items sometimes!"); //Server.fightCaves.spawnNextWave(c); c.HardWaveSpawn(); }
Maybe there is something else that needs fixing to change the death location? Please help! And thanks for reading this![/quote]

Die type ::mypos and search the coords in your server files.
